[DQR.IFRS.0080.7969] ifrs-full:ImpairmentLossOnReceivablesOrContractAssetsArisingFromContractsWithCustomers has a value of -418,000 which is less than zero. This element should not have a negative value.
The properties of this ifrs-full:ImpairmentLossOnReceivablesOrContractAssetsArisingFromContractsWithCustomers fact are: Period :2020-01-01 to 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/5299002NZCMF1NIHZ018/2020-12-31/ESEF/DE/0/5299002NZCMF1NIHZ018-2020-12-31.zip/PATRIZIA_AG_KA+KLB_ESEF-2020-12-31/reports/5299002NZCMF1NIHZ018-2020-12-31.xhtml 5

[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of [320Â 000] Gesamtergebnisrechnung, Gewinn oder Verlust, Umsatzkostenverfahren but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:ProfitLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests, ifrs-full:IncomeTaxExpenseContinuingOperations, PAXNGesamtleistung, PAXNEBITDAR, PAXNEBITDA, ifrs-full:ProfitLoss All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
